scripts.format: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx format:write
scripts.format:check: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx format:check
scripts.lint: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx run-many -t lint --all
scripts.typecheck: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx run-many -t build --all --exclude=renderer-e2e
scripts.unit-test: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx run-many -t test --all --exclude=renderer-e2e
scripts.integration-test: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx run-many -t test --projects=contracts,desktop-api,core,repository,shell,common
scripts.e2e-smoke: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx e2e renderer-e2e
scripts.a11y-e2e: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx e2e renderer-e2e --grep @a11y
scripts.i18n-check: cross-env TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp tsx tools/scripts/check-i18n.ts
scripts.build-renderer: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx build renderer --skipNxCache
scripts.build-desktop-main: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx build desktop-main --skipNxCache && pnpm run python-runtime:sync-dist
scripts.build-desktop-preload: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx build desktop-preload --skipNxCache
scripts.build-desktop: pnpm run build-desktop-main && pnpm run build-desktop-preload
scripts.build: pnpm run build-renderer && pnpm run build-desktop
scripts.renderer:serve: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx serve renderer
scripts.desktop:dev: pnpm run build-desktop && (pnpm renderer:serve & pnpm wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development RENDERER_DEV_URL=http://localhost:4200 electron dist/apps/desktop-main/main.js)
scripts.runtime:smoke: cross-env NX_DAEMON=false TMPDIR=/tmp TMP=/tmp TEMP=/tmp pnpm nx run-many -t build --projects=renderer,desktop-preload,desktop-main && node tools/scripts/runtime-smoke.mjs
scripts.forge:make: pnpm run forge:clean && pnpm run build && electron-forge make
scripts.forge:make:staging: pnpm run forge:clean && pnpm run python-runtime:assert && cross-env APP_ENV=staging DESKTOP_ENABLE_DEVTOOLS=1 pnpm nx run renderer:build:staging --skipNxCache && cross-env APP_ENV=staging DESKTOP_ENABLE_DEVTOOLS=1 pnpm nx run desktop-main:build:staging --skipNxCache && pnpm run python-runtime:sync-dist && cross-env APP_ENV=staging DESKTOP_ENABLE_DEVTOOLS=1 pnpm nx run desktop-preload:build --skipNxCache && cross-env APP_ENV=staging DESKTOP_ENABLE_DEVTOOLS=1 electron-forge make
scripts.forge:make:production: pnpm run forge:clean && pnpm run python-runtime:assert && cross-env APP_ENV=production DESKTOP_ENABLE_DEVTOOLS=0 pnpm run build && cross-env APP_ENV=production DESKTOP_ENABLE_DEVTOOLS=0 electron-forge make
scripts.ci:local: pnpm nx format:check --all && pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm unit-test && pnpm integration-test && pnpm e2e-smoke && pnpm a11y-e2e && pnpm i18n-check && pnpm build-renderer && pnpm build-desktop && pnpm runtime:smoke && pnpm dependency-audit --audit-level=high && pnpm license-compliance && pnpm perf:check
